alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Livingston; St. James (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 4:08PM CDT until August 27 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northern Assumption Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 408 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prairieville, or 7 miles southeast of Oak Hills Place, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Sorrento, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Prairieville, Village St. George, Carville, Belle Rose, Shenandoah, and Gardere. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 165 and 187. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Livingston; St. James
